001package gbw.melange.common.elementary.contraints;
002
003/**
004 * In relation to the extends and mesh of the element this element is attached to.
005 *
006 * @author GustavBW
007 * @version $Id: $Id
008 */
009public enum ElementAnchoring {
010    CENTER(.5, .5),
011    TOP(.5,1),
012    TOP_RIGHT(1,1),
013    RIGHT(1,.5),
014    BOTTOM_RIGHT(1,0),
015    BOTTOM(.5, 0),
016    BOTTOM_LEFT(0,0),
017    LEFT(0, .5),
018    TOP_LEFT(0,1);
019
020    /**
021     * Representative directions in terms of a vector for which each component is in the range 0-1.
022     * {.5, .5} is the center, {0, 0} is bottom left, {1, 1} is top right.
023     */
024    public final Anchor anchor;
025    ElementAnchoring(double x, double y){
026        assert x > 0 && x <= 1 && y > 0 && y <= 1;
027        this.anchor = new Anchor(x, y);
028    }
029}
